Synvert

synvert is used to convert ruby code to better syntax.

Write Snippet

We encourage developers to create their own snippets and send pull request to us. There are several rules you should follow to create your own snippets.

  1. use a unique name, and write description to explain what the snippet does.
  2. add comments to explain what each instance does, e.g. # Factory.create(:post) => create(:post)
  3. test snippet, see our example here.

If you don't want to write the snippet by yourself, feel free to open an issue to us, we can help you write it.
